name: React Github Finder
text: A GitHub user finder using create-react-app, react-router, reusable components, Axios and styled with MaterializeCSS that returns he first 30 users matching user input entered into the search bar. Preview of the user's profile is displayed by selecting the "More" button, which will navigate to the user's profile preview where common stats are displayed.

name: Personal Portfolio
text: My personal portfolio created using create-react-app with reusable components and modular design. The components can be reused in various projects and keeps the code from becoming cumbersome. The contact form is set up using the nodemailer module and Axios.

name: Node Express Mail API
text: Node application that takes post request to send a custom tailored email from the credentials that you provide in the query string with the values you input through an object as the body to a specified email or emails. This application was created using Node.js, Express.js and the nodemailer module.
